text: Bring Me the Head of Alfredo Garcia () is a 1974 Mexican-American Western movie directed by Sam Peckinpah, co-written by Peckinpah and Gordon Dawson from a story by Peckinpah and Frank Kowalski, and starring Warren Oates, Isela Vega, Gig Young, Kris Kristofferson and Robert Webber. It was distributed by United Artists. == Other websites == * * Category:1974 action movies Category:1974 thriller movies Category:1970s Western (genre) movies Category:American Western (genre) movies Category:American action thriller movies Category:Mexican Western (genre) movies Category:Mexican action movies Category:Mexican thriller movies Category:Movies directed by Sam Peckinpah Category:Movies set in Mexico
title: Bring Me the Head of Alfredo Garcia
